We have developed a ground-breaking medical device for the diagnosis and treatment of the most common heart rhythm disorder, atrial fibrillation - which can cause stroke, heart failure, and other heart-related complications. Kardium's mission is to deliver the best treatment for atrial fibrillation. To achieve this, we have developed The Globe® Pulsed Field System - we have a fantastic technical team that has developed a product with strong, unique, and customer-valued differentiators versus other solutions on the market. We have built connections with key opinion leaders who are already using the Globe System and are helping to tell our story. We have obtained FDA approval and officially begun the commercial launch of the Globe® Pulsed Field System. This is a pivotal and exciting time in our journey, as we bring this life-changing technology to patients! As a member of the IT team, you will get hands-on experience working in a collaborative environment, learning industry best practices, and developing technical and communication skills that will prepare you for a successful career in IT. Please note, this opportunity is an onsite work arrangement, located in Burnaby, BC. Documenting processes and creating knowledge base articles to support continuous improvement. • Why work at Kardium?
